default.instructions: Maintain the original formatting and tone. Ensure accurate and natural translation.
default.prompt: Translate the following text from {from_language} to {to_language}. Only return the translated text.

destination.instructions: This content is for a tourism website. Maintain professional tone while being engaging and appealing to tourists.

title.instructions: Keep titles concise and appealing for tourism
title.prompt: Translate this destination title. Keep it concise and appealing for tourism.

sub_title.instructions: Subtitles should be descriptive and engaging
sub_title.prompt: Translate this destination subtitle. Maintain the marketing appeal and tourism context.

introduction.instructions: Introductions should be welcoming and informative
introduction.prompt: Translate this destination introduction. Maintain the tourism context and engaging tone.

content.instructions: Preserve HTML formatting and maintain professional tone
content.prompt: Translate this detailed destination content. Preserve HTML formatting and tourism-specific terminology.

fish.instructions: Use accurate fishing terminology and maintain technical precision

chart.instructions: Use proper local fish species names and terminology
chart.prompt: Translate this fish species information. Use proper local fishing terminology.

limits.instructions: Maintain accuracy of measurements and regulations
limits.prompt: Translate these fishing regulations. Maintain accuracy of technical terms and measurements.

faq.instructions: Keep a conversational yet professional tone

question.instructions: Questions should be clear and natural
question.prompt: Translate this FAQ question. Keep the tone conversational but professional.

answer.instructions: Answers should be clear and helpful
answer.prompt: Translate this FAQ answer. Maintain accuracy of information and keep the explanatory tone.
